description: Multipart form data for creating a skill. All files must be in the same top-level directory and must include a SKILL.md file at the root of that directory.

display_title.description: Display title for the skill. This is a human-readable label that is not included in the prompt sent to the model.

files.description: Files to upload for the skill. All files must be in the same top-level directory and must include a SKILL.md file at the root of that directory.

items.description: A file to upload for the skill.
